title: As Peak Summer Vacation Season Kicks Off, Enhance Your Selfies With YouCam Makeup And YouCam Perfect
text: As Peak Summer Vacation Season Kicks Off, Enhance Your Selfies With YouCam Makeup And YouCam Perfect By PR Newswire | 07/15/15 - 07:15 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK , July 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Selfies have firmly ingrained themselves into everyday life and popular culture. With summer and vacation season in full swing, meet your new favorite beauty tools for your best selfie: YouCam Makeup and YouCam Perfect from Perfect Corp ., a spin-off from the world's leading consumer multimedia software company CyberLink . For those anticipating that summer glow pre-vacation, the highly popular makeover app YouCam Makeup lets users "try on" a bronzed skin look to envision what they might look like at the end of their vacation! For even more fun on vacation, YouCam Makeup's face painting looks allow users to express their inner artist with festive costume makeovers. Taking summer memories to the next level, YouCam Perfect serves as a great tool to create seasonal and travel themed photo collages. Use separately or together, these two free apps effortlessly allow users to highlight their fun in the sun and make the average photo "picture perfect.""As selfies continue to grow in popularity, users are seeking more ways to beautify and personalize them," said Alice H. Chang , CEO of Perfect Corp. parent company CyberLink. "We are thrilled to expand the range of new selfie tools available, letting users customize their selfies for all of life's moments. Whether painting your face to get festival-ready or trying out new makeup looks to fit your changing style, YouCam Makeup and YouCam Perfect offer users more ways than ever to share their visual identity with the world."Pushing selfie development even further, Perfect Corp. recently announced the launch of festive face paint looks in the YouCam Makeup app. This feature is perfect for those who will be attending music festivals and want to preview outlandish looks before committing to "the one."If you love your look, be sure to share it with beauty enthusiasts worldwide through Beauty Circle , which is accessible through YouCam Perfect and YouCam Makeup. Recognized as the first beauty, fashion, makeup and style-driven social community, Beauty Circle brings together beauty lovers worldwide, and highlights the latest trends, provides makeup tutorials and shares exclusive tips from industry experts. This year, YouCam Makeup was awarded the 2015 Appy Award in the Fashion & Apparels category and the Tabby Award in the Lifestyle category. YouCam Perfect was an Appy Awards finalist in the Camera category and a nominee for a Tabby Award in the Photo category. 1 of 3
